name: Battle Khaos
overview: Battle Khaos is a 2-4 player RPG for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Rafal Kazimierski and released into the public domain in 2003. The game was heavily inspired by the 1985 ZX Spectrum classic "Chaos: The Battle of Wizards", a game written by the legendary Julian Gallop (of X-Com fame).
